properties.areaDesc: Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 3 at 4:18AM MST until February 5 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, temperatures in the lower
30s expected. For the second Freeze Warning, temperatures
around 30 expected.

* WHERE...West Pinal County and Sonoran Desert National Monument.

* WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to
9 AM MST Tuesday. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight
Tuesday night to 9 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TUESDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY
